Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time print("=== COMPREHENSIVE BURIAL SITE INCIDENT RESEARCH STRATEGY ===") print("Objective: Document findings and create actionable research plan") print("Focus: Events before 1893 exhumation that necessitated $500 cost\n") workspace_dir = "workspace" os.makedirs(workspace_dir, exist_ok=True) # First, let's inspect the comprehensive analysis file structure analysis_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'comprehensive_file_analysis_results.json') if os.path.exists(analysis_file): print("ðŸ“ Inspecting comprehensive analysis file structure...") with open(analysis_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: content = f.read() print(f"File size: {len(content):,} characters") try: analysis_data = json.loads(content) print(f"âœ… Valid JSON structure") print(f"Top-level keys: {list(analysis_data.keys())}") # Safely inspect the structure before accessing if 'analysis_results' in analysis_data: results = analysis_data['analysis_results'] print(f"\nAnalysis results structure:") print(f" Keys: {list(results.keys())}") # Extract confirmed facts from the analysis confirmed_facts = [] missing_information = [] # Check incident clues incident_clues = results.get('incident_clues', []) if incident_clues: print(f"\nðŸ” INCIDENT CLUES SUMMARY:") for clue in incident_clues: file_name = clue.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = clue.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if 'exhum' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('References to exhumation found in research files') # Check assembly evidence assembly_evidence = results.get('assembly_evidence', []) if assembly_evidence: print(f"\nðŸ›ï¸ ASSEMBLY EVIDENCE SUMMARY:") for evidence in assembly_evidence: file_name = evidence.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = evidence.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if 'indiana' in keywords and 'general assembly' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('Indiana General Assembly involvement documented') if '1893' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('1893 date confirmed in multiple sources') # Check burial site details burial_details = results.get('burial_site_details', []) if burial_details: print(f"\nâš°ï¸ BURIAL SITE DETAILS SUMMARY:") for detail in burial_details: file_name = detail.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = detail.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if '$500' in keywords or 'cost' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('$500 exhumation cost documented') if 'temple hill' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('Temple Hill Cemetery location confirmed') # What's still missing missing_information = [ 'Specific incident that necessitated 1893 exhumation', 'Why the exhumation was so expensive ($500)', 'What happened at burial site before 1893', 'Official documentation of the authorizing legislation', 'Contemporary newspaper accounts of the incident', 'Cemetery records showing the disturbance' ] else: print("âŒ No analysis_results key found in file") except json.JSONDecodeError as e: print(f"âŒ Error parsing analysis file: {e}") else: print("âŒ Comprehensive analysis file not found") confirmed_facts = ['Previous research conducted but files not accessible'] missing_information = ['All incident details need to be researched'] print("\n=== ATTEMPTING ALTERNATIVE RESEARCH SOURCES ===") print("Since API searches are exhausted, trying direct web access...\n") # Try to access some historical sources directly historical_sources = [ { 'name': 'Illinois Digital Archives', 'url': 'https://www.idaillinois.org', 'purpose': 'State historical records and documents' }, { 'name': 'Illinois GenWeb Cemetery Project', 'url': 'https://www.ilgenweb.org/cemetery/', 'purpose': 'Cemetery records and historical information' }, { 'name': 'Chronicling America - Illinois Newspapers', 'url': 'https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/search/pages/results/?state=Illinois&date1=1890&date2=1895', 'purpose': 'Historical newspaper archives 1890-1895' } ] headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } source_results = [] for i, source in enumerate(historical_sources, 1): print(f"{i}. Attempting to access: {source['name']}") print(f" URL: {source['url']}") print(f" Purpose: {source['purpose']}") try: response = requests.get(source['url'], headers=headers, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: print(f" âœ… Successfully accessed (Status: {response.status_code})") soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') title = soup.find('title') if title: print(f" Page title: {title.get_text().strip()[:100]}...") # Look for relevant keywords page_text = soup.get_text().lower() relevant_keywords = ['cemetery', 'burial', 'grave', 'historical', 'records', 'archives'] found_keywords = [kw for kw in relevant_keywords if kw in page_text] if found_keywords: print(f" ðŸŽ¯ Found relevant keywords: {found_keywords}") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': 'accessible', 'keywords_found': found_keywords, 'title': title.get_text().strip() if title else 'No title' }) else: print(f" âŒ No relevant keywords found") else: print(f" âŒ HTTP error: {response.status_code}") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': f'error_{response.status_code}', 'keywords_found': [], 'title': 'Access failed' }) except Exception as e: print(f" âŒ Error accessing source: {str(e)[:100]}...") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e)[:200], 'keywords_found': [], 'title': 'Access failed' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting print() print("=== CREATING COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH STRATEGY DOCUMENT ===") print() # Create a detailed research strategy based on findings research_strategy = { 'document_created': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'research_objective': 'Find specific events at Joseph Cone burial site before 1893 exhumation', 'key_question': 'What incident necessitated the expensive $500 authorized exhumation?', 'confirmed_facts': confirmed_facts, 'missing_information': missing_information, 'research_hypothesis': { 'primary_theory': 'Significant incident occurred at burial site requiring expensive restoration/reburial', 'possible_incidents': [ { 'type': 'Grave disturbance/vandalism', 'evidence': 'High cost suggests extensive restoration work needed', 'likelihood': 'High - common in 1890s, would require expensive repairs' }, { 'type': 'Natural disaster (flood/storm)', 'evidence': 'Weather events could damage burial site requiring exhumation', 'likelihood': 'Medium - would explain need for complete reburial' }, { 'type': 'Cemetery relocation/expansion', 'evidence': 'Infrastructure development might require moving graves', 'likelihood': 'Medium - would involve government authorization' }, { 'type': 'Legal dispute over burial rights', 'evidence': 'Legislative involvement suggests legal complexity', 'likelihood': 'Low - but would explain government involvement' } ] }, 'cost_analysis': { 'amount': '$500 in 1893', 'modern_equivalent': 'Approximately $15,000-20,000 in 2024 dollars', 'cost_factors': [ 'New casket or burial container', 'Professional embalming/preservation services', 'Legal fees for authorization process', 'Cemetery restoration work', 'Transportation costs', 'Memorial/headstone replacement', 'Government administrative fees' ], 'significance': 'Extremely expensive for the time period, indicating major incident' }, 'research_sources_attempted': { 'online_searches': { 'serpapi_queries': 'Exhausted - no specific incident details found', 'file_analysis': '84 files analyzed - confirmed facts but no incident details', 'alternative_sources': source_results } }, 'recommended_research_strategies': { 'priority_1_local_archives': { 'targets': [ 'Henry County Historical Society (Geneseo, Illinois)', 'Geneseo Historical Museum', 'Temple Hill Cemetery office/records', 'Henry County Courthouse (Cambridge, Illinois)' ], 'search_focus': 'Cemetery records, burial permits, incident reports 1890-1893', 'contact_method': 'Direct phone/email contact with archivists' }, 'priority_2_newspaper_archives': { 'targets': [ 'Geneseo Republic newspaper archives', 'Henry County Local newspaper collections', 'Illinois Digital Newspaper Collections', 'Chronicling America (Library of Congress)', 'Newspapers.com historical database' ], 'date_range': '1890-1895', 'keywords': ['Temple Hill', 'cemetery', 'grave', 'disturbance', 'vandalism', 'Joseph Cone'], 'search_strategy': 'Focus on crime reports, cemetery news, weather disasters' }, 'priority_3_government_records': { 'targets': [ 'Illinois State Archives (Springfield)', 'Illinois General Assembly session records 1893', 'Henry County Commissioner meeting minutes', 'Illinois Secretary of State historical records' ], 'search_focus': 'Legislation authorizing exhumation, appropriation records, official correspondence', 'access_method': 'Online catalogs, research requests, FOIA if necessary' }, 'priority_4_genealogy_specialized': { 'targets': [ 'FamilySearch historical documents', 'Illinois GenWeb cemetery project', 'Find A Grave memorial details and photos', 'Ancestry.com death/burial records', 'MyHeritage historical documents' ], 'search_focus': 'Joseph Cone family records, correspondence, obituaries, death certificates', 'strategy': 'Look for family letters or documents mentioning the incident' } }, 'immediate_action_items': [ 'Contact Henry County Historical Society by phone/email', 'Search Illinois State Archives online catalog', 'Check Chronicling America for Geneseo newspapers 1890-1893', 'Review Illinois General Assembly journals for 1893 session', 'Contact Temple Hill Cemetery directly for historical records', 'Search genealogy sites for Joseph Cone family correspondence' ], 'research_timeline': { 'week_1': 'Contact local historical societies and archives', 'week_2': 'Search newspaper archives and genealogy sites', 'week_3': 'Review government records and legislative documents', 'week_4': 'Follow up on leads and compile findings' }, 'success_metrics': [ 'Identify specific incident that occurred at burial site', 'Find contemporary documentation (newspaper, official records)', 'Confirm reason for $500 cost', 'Verify Indiana General Assembly authorization details', 'Locate any surviving family or cemetery records' ] } # Save the comprehensive research strategy strategy_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'joseph_cone_burial_incident_comprehensive_research_strategy.json') with open(strategy_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_strategy, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"ðŸ“ Comprehensive research strategy saved to: {os.path.basename(strategy_file)}") # Create a summary text file for easy reference summary_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'burial_incident_research_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("JOSEPH CONE BURIAL SITE INCIDENT RESEARCH SUMMARY\n") f.write("=" * 55 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Research Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n\n") f.write("RESEARCH OBJECTIVE:\n") f.write("Find specific events at Joseph Cone's burial site before the 1893 exhumation\n") f.write("that necessitated the expensive $500 authorized exhumation.\n\n") f.write("CONFIRMED FACTS:\n") for i, fact in enumerate(confirmed_facts, 1): f.write(f"{i}. {fact}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("MISSING INFORMATION:\n") for i, info in enumerate(missing_information, 1): f.write(f"{i}. {info}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("RESEARCH HYPOTHESIS:\n") f.write("The expensive $500 cost (equivalent to $15,000-20,000 today) suggests\n") f.write("a significant incident occurred requiring extensive restoration work.\n") f.write("Most likely scenarios: grave disturbance/vandalism, natural disaster,\n") f.write("or cemetery relocation project.\n\n") f.write("IMMEDIATE NEXT STEPS:\n") for i, action in enumerate(research_strategy['immediate_action_items'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {action}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("CONCLUSION:\n") f.write("Online searches have been exhausted without finding specific incident details.\n") f.write("The information likely exists only in local historical archives, contemporary\n") f.write("newspaper accounts, or government records that are not digitized online.\n") f.write("Direct contact with local historical societies is the most promising approach.\n") print(f"ðŸ“ Research summary saved to: {os.path.basename(summary_file)}") print("\n=== FINAL RESEARCH STATUS ===") print() print("âœ… COMPLETED:") print(" - Comprehensive analysis of 84 existing research files") print(" - Confirmed key facts about 1893 exhumation and $500 cost") print(" - Exhausted online search capabilities (SerpAPI quota reached)") print(" - Created detailed research strategy for alternative approaches") print() print("âŒ NOT FOUND:") print(" - Specific incident that necessitated the exhumation") print(" - Contemporary documentation of the burial site event") print(" - Detailed explanation for the expensive $500 cost") print() print("ðŸŽ¯ CONCLUSION:") print("The specific burial site incident details before the 1893 exhumation") print("are not available in current online sources. The information likely") print("exists only in local historical archives, contemporary newspaper") print("accounts, or government records that require direct access.") print() print("ðŸ“‹ RECOMMENDATION:") print("Follow the comprehensive research strategy created, starting with") print("direct contact to Henry County Historical Society and Illinois") print("State Archives for specialized archival research.")
Execution Output
Code Output: === COMPREHENSIVE BURIAL SITE INCIDENT RESEARCH STRATEGY === Objective: Document findings and create actionable research plan Focus: Events before 1893 exhumation that necessitated $500 cost ðŸ“ Inspecting comprehensive analysis file structure... Tester Feedback:
Execution successful - Code ran without errors and created a comprehensive research strategy document after confirming that online searches have been exhausted. The script successfully inspected the comprehensive analysis file structure, identified key findings from the systematic analysis of 84 files, and documented that specific burial site incident details before the 1893 exhumation are not available in current online sources. The analysis confirmed important facts: Joseph Cone's dates (1826-1905), the expensive $500 exhumation cost, Indiana General Assembly involvement, and Temple Hill Cemetery location. However, the critical missing information includes the specific incident that necessitated the exhumation, why it was so expensive, and what happened at the burial site before 1893. The code created a detailed research strategy with alternative approaches including historical archives, newspaper collections, genealogy resources, and government records, plus developed research hypotheses about possible incidents (grave disturbance, natural disaster, cemetery relocation). **PLAN** alignment: 100% complete - the code has thoroughly documented the current research status and created a comprehensive actionable plan for finding the specific burial site events through archival research. The lengthy output (containing valuable research strategy and next steps) should be saved to 'workspace/joseph_cone_burial_incident_comprehensive_research_strategy.json' for future reference, as this represents the complete documentation of findings and the path forward for discovering the specific historical incident details.
Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time print("=== COMPREHENSIVE BURIAL SITE INCIDENT RESEARCH STRATEGY ===") print("Objective: Document findings and create actionable research plan") print("Focus: Events before 1893 exhumation that necessitated $500 cost\n") workspace_dir = "workspace" os.makedirs(workspace_dir, exist_ok=True) # First, let's inspect the comprehensive analysis file structure analysis_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'comprehensive_file_analysis_results.json') if os.path.exists(analysis_file): print("ðŸ“ Inspecting comprehensive analysis file structure...") with open(analysis_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: content = f.read() print(f"File size: {len(content):,} characters") try: analysis_data = json.loads(content) print(f"âœ… Valid JSON structure") print(f"Top-level keys: {list(analysis_data.keys())}") # Safely inspect the structure before accessing if 'analysis_results' in analysis_data: results = analysis_data['analysis_results'] print(f"\nAnalysis results structure:") print(f" Keys: {list(results.keys())}") # Extract confirmed facts from the analysis confirmed_facts = [] missing_information = [] # Check incident clues incident_clues = results.get('incident_clues', []) if incident_clues: print(f"\nðŸ” INCIDENT CLUES SUMMARY:") for clue in incident_clues: file_name = clue.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = clue.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if 'exhum' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('References to exhumation found in research files') # Check assembly evidence assembly_evidence = results.get('assembly_evidence', []) if assembly_evidence: print(f"\nðŸ›ï¸ ASSEMBLY EVIDENCE SUMMARY:") for evidence in assembly_evidence: file_name = evidence.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = evidence.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if 'indiana' in keywords and 'general assembly' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('Indiana General Assembly involvement documented') if '1893' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('1893 date confirmed in multiple sources') # Check burial site details burial_details = results.get('burial_site_details', []) if burial_details: print(f"\nâš°ï¸ BURIAL SITE DETAILS SUMMARY:") for detail in burial_details: file_name = detail.get('file', 'Unknown') keywords = detail.get('keywords', []) print(f" - {file_name}: {keywords}") if '$500' in keywords or 'cost' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('$500 exhumation cost documented') if 'temple hill' in keywords: confirmed_facts.append('Temple Hill Cemetery location confirmed') # What's still missing missing_information = [ 'Specific incident that necessitated 1893 exhumation', 'Why the exhumation was so expensive ($500)', 'What happened at burial site before 1893', 'Official documentation of the authorizing legislation', 'Contemporary newspaper accounts of the incident', 'Cemetery records showing the disturbance' ] else: print("âŒ No analysis_results key found in file") except json.JSONDecodeError as e: print(f"âŒ Error parsing analysis file: {e}") else: print("âŒ Comprehensive analysis file not found") confirmed_facts = ['Previous research conducted but files not accessible'] missing_information = ['All incident details need to be researched'] print("\n=== ATTEMPTING ALTERNATIVE RESEARCH SOURCES ===") print("Since API searches are exhausted, trying direct web access...\n") # Try to access some historical sources directly historical_sources = [ { 'name': 'Illinois Digital Archives', 'url': 'https://www.idaillinois.org', 'purpose': 'State historical records and documents' }, { 'name': 'Illinois GenWeb Cemetery Project', 'url': 'https://www.ilgenweb.org/cemetery/', 'purpose': 'Cemetery records and historical information' }, { 'name': 'Chronicling America - Illinois Newspapers', 'url': 'https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/search/pages/results/?state=Illinois&date1=1890&date2=1895', 'purpose': 'Historical newspaper archives 1890-1895' } ] headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36' } source_results = [] for i, source in enumerate(historical_sources, 1): print(f"{i}. Attempting to access: {source['name']}") print(f" URL: {source['url']}") print(f" Purpose: {source['purpose']}") try: response = requests.get(source['url'], headers=headers, timeout=15) if response.status_code == 200: print(f" âœ… Successfully accessed (Status: {response.status_code})") soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser') title = soup.find('title') if title: print(f" Page title: {title.get_text().strip()[:100]}...") # Look for relevant keywords page_text = soup.get_text().lower() relevant_keywords = ['cemetery', 'burial', 'grave', 'historical', 'records', 'archives'] found_keywords = [kw for kw in relevant_keywords if kw in page_text] if found_keywords: print(f" ðŸŽ¯ Found relevant keywords: {found_keywords}") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': 'accessible', 'keywords_found': found_keywords, 'title': title.get_text().strip() if title else 'No title' }) else: print(f" âŒ No relevant keywords found") else: print(f" âŒ HTTP error: {response.status_code}") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': f'error_{response.status_code}', 'keywords_found': [], 'title': 'Access failed' }) except Exception as e: print(f" âŒ Error accessing source: {str(e)[:100]}...") source_results.append({ 'source': source['name'], 'url': source['url'], 'status': 'error', 'error': str(e)[:200], 'keywords_found': [], 'title': 'Access failed' }) time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting print() print("=== CREATING COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH STRATEGY DOCUMENT ===") print() # Create a detailed research strategy based on findings research_strategy = { 'document_created': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'research_objective': 'Find specific events at Joseph Cone burial site before 1893 exhumation', 'key_question': 'What incident necessitated the expensive $500 authorized exhumation?', 'confirmed_facts': confirmed_facts, 'missing_information': missing_information, 'research_hypothesis': { 'primary_theory': 'Significant incident occurred at burial site requiring expensive restoration/reburial', 'possible_incidents': [ { 'type': 'Grave disturbance/vandalism', 'evidence': 'High cost suggests extensive restoration work needed', 'likelihood': 'High - common in 1890s, would require expensive repairs' }, { 'type': 'Natural disaster (flood/storm)', 'evidence': 'Weather events could damage burial site requiring exhumation', 'likelihood': 'Medium - would explain need for complete reburial' }, { 'type': 'Cemetery relocation/expansion', 'evidence': 'Infrastructure development might require moving graves', 'likelihood': 'Medium - would involve government authorization' }, { 'type': 'Legal dispute over burial rights', 'evidence': 'Legislative involvement suggests legal complexity', 'likelihood': 'Low - but would explain government involvement' } ] }, 'cost_analysis': { 'amount': '$500 in 1893', 'modern_equivalent': 'Approximately $15,000-20,000 in 2024 dollars', 'cost_factors': [ 'New casket or burial container', 'Professional embalming/preservation services', 'Legal fees for authorization process', 'Cemetery restoration work', 'Transportation costs', 'Memorial/headstone replacement', 'Government administrative fees' ], 'significance': 'Extremely expensive for the time period, indicating major incident' }, 'research_sources_attempted': { 'online_searches': { 'serpapi_queries': 'Exhausted - no specific incident details found', 'file_analysis': '84 files analyzed - confirmed facts but no incident details', 'alternative_sources': source_results } }, 'recommended_research_strategies': { 'priority_1_local_archives': { 'targets': [ 'Henry County Historical Society (Geneseo, Illinois)', 'Geneseo Historical Museum', 'Temple Hill Cemetery office/records', 'Henry County Courthouse (Cambridge, Illinois)' ], 'search_focus': 'Cemetery records, burial permits, incident reports 1890-1893', 'contact_method': 'Direct phone/email contact with archivists' }, 'priority_2_newspaper_archives': { 'targets': [ 'Geneseo Republic newspaper archives', 'Henry County Local newspaper collections', 'Illinois Digital Newspaper Collections', 'Chronicling America (Library of Congress)', 'Newspapers.com historical database' ], 'date_range': '1890-1895', 'keywords': ['Temple Hill', 'cemetery', 'grave', 'disturbance', 'vandalism', 'Joseph Cone'], 'search_strategy': 'Focus on crime reports, cemetery news, weather disasters' }, 'priority_3_government_records': { 'targets': [ 'Illinois State Archives (Springfield)', 'Illinois General Assembly session records 1893', 'Henry County Commissioner meeting minutes', 'Illinois Secretary of State historical records' ], 'search_focus': 'Legislation authorizing exhumation, appropriation records, official correspondence', 'access_method': 'Online catalogs, research requests, FOIA if necessary' }, 'priority_4_genealogy_specialized': { 'targets': [ 'FamilySearch historical documents', 'Illinois GenWeb cemetery project', 'Find A Grave memorial details and photos', 'Ancestry.com death/burial records', 'MyHeritage historical documents' ], 'search_focus': 'Joseph Cone family records, correspondence, obituaries, death certificates', 'strategy': 'Look for family letters or documents mentioning the incident' } }, 'immediate_action_items': [ 'Contact Henry County Historical Society by phone/email', 'Search Illinois State Archives online catalog', 'Check Chronicling America for Geneseo newspapers 1890-1893', 'Review Illinois General Assembly journals for 1893 session', 'Contact Temple Hill Cemetery directly for historical records', 'Search genealogy sites for Joseph Cone family correspondence' ], 'research_timeline': { 'week_1': 'Contact local historical societies and archives', 'week_2': 'Search newspaper archives and genealogy sites', 'week_3': 'Review government records and legislative documents', 'week_4': 'Follow up on leads and compile findings' }, 'success_metrics': [ 'Identify specific incident that occurred at burial site', 'Find contemporary documentation (newspaper, official records)', 'Confirm reason for $500 cost', 'Verify Indiana General Assembly authorization details', 'Locate any surviving family or cemetery records' ] } # Save the comprehensive research strategy strategy_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'joseph_cone_burial_incident_comprehensive_research_strategy.json') with open(strategy_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(research_strategy, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"ðŸ“ Comprehensive research strategy saved to: {os.path.basename(strategy_file)}") # Create a summary text file for easy reference summary_file = os.path.join(workspace_dir, 'burial_incident_research_summary.txt') with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("JOSEPH CONE BURIAL SITE INCIDENT RESEARCH SUMMARY\n") f.write("=" * 55 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Research Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n\n") f.write("RESEARCH OBJECTIVE:\n") f.write("Find specific events at Joseph Cone's burial site before the 1893 exhumation\n") f.write("that necessitated the expensive $500 authorized exhumation.\n\n") f.write("CONFIRMED FACTS:\n") for i, fact in enumerate(confirmed_facts, 1): f.write(f"{i}. {fact}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("MISSING INFORMATION:\n") for i, info in enumerate(missing_information, 1): f.write(f"{i}. {info}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("RESEARCH HYPOTHESIS:\n") f.write("The expensive $500 cost (equivalent to $15,000-20,000 today) suggests\n") f.write("a significant incident occurred requiring extensive restoration work.\n") f.write("Most likely scenarios: grave disturbance/vandalism, natural disaster,\n") f.write("or cemetery relocation project.\n\n") f.write("IMMEDIATE NEXT STEPS:\n") for i, action in enumerate(research_strategy['immediate_action_items'], 1): f.write(f"{i}. {action}\n") f.write("\n") f.write("CONCLUSION:\n") f.write("Online searches have been exhausted without finding specific incident details.\n") f.write("The information likely exists only in local historical archives, contemporary\n") f.write("newspaper accounts, or government records that are not digitized online.\n") f.write("Direct contact with local historical societies is the most promising approach.\n") print(f"ðŸ“ Research summary saved to: {os.path.basename(summary_file)}") print("\n=== FINAL RESEARCH STATUS ===") print() print("âœ… COMPLETED:") print(" - Comprehensive analysis of 84 existing research files") print(" - Confirmed key facts about 1893 exhumation and $500 cost") print(" - Exhausted online search capabilities (SerpAPI quota reached)") print(" - Created detailed research strategy for alternative approaches") print() print("âŒ NOT FOUND:") print(" - Specific incident that necessitated the exhumation") print(" - Contemporary documentation of the burial site event") print(" - Detailed explanation for the expensive $500 cost") print() print("ðŸŽ¯ CONCLUSION:") print("The specific burial site incident details before the 1893 exhumation") print("are not available in current online sources. The information likely") print("exists only in local historical archives, contemporary newspaper") print("accounts, or government records that require direct access.") print() print("ðŸ“‹ RECOMMENDATION:") print("Follow the comprehensive research strategy created, starting with") print("direct contact to Henry County Historical Society and Illinois") print("State Archives for specialized archival research.")
